title: TUESDAY TEAMFIGHT! Come play vs the Boards Dev Team!
body:
Starts at 2pm PST!

Game name: TUESDAY TEAMFIGHT
Password: salty

Come play! (Sorry we missed you last week, the team was out of town!)

<3 {{champion:111}}

replies.body: Behold, the long-awaited return! Glad to see you have time again. Sorry that you were too busy last week, and even more sorry that you got such unnecessarily harsh negativity from it.
It was 1 or 2 trolls on multiple accounts harassing people. They can be discounted.
WOOT WOOT! Autobots, ROLL OUT! {{champion:33}}

Password must be...Lambs!

Edit: Salty is a perfectly appropriate password :3
Yes, yes it is. ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Baconhawk,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=QdBycwcR,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-09-29T20:55:59.323+0000)
>
> Starts at 2pm PST!
> 
> Game name: TUESDAY TEAMFIGHT
> Password: salty
> 
> Come play! (Sorry we missed you last week, the team was out of town!)
> 
> <3 {{champion:111}}

Hey, that was a lot of fun! I'm really sorry for getting Vlad :(
It's okay, we had a good time :D
GG devs ;)
{{champion:54}}  Let's rock! Wonder if we can win JUST ONE of these games, pls?

> [{quoted}](name=Shockem,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=QdBycwcR,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-09-29T21:02:59.253+0000)
>
> {{champion:54}}  Let's rock! Wonder if we can win JUST ONE of these games, pls?

are they challenger? :O
Shockem is a Rioter ;)

{{champion:32}} and his salty {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Edit: what'd you think about [this](https://twitter.com/RiotMoonleaf/status/646358653897994240)?
could be fun..maybeh
Im down
Is this always at 2pm PST on Tuesdays?
I refreshed page, saw password revealed, went to join game. game full D: instantly full
I was surprised too! I guess this got to be a known thing!
I'm thinking a T-day fights could be a valuable community interaction with the Riot team ;) Tuesday and Thursday fights.

No!!!! :(
I want this to go back to how it was, when no one knew you made this thread and it took forever for the room to be filled and I could come 20 mins late and still find a spot ;-;
rofl :) sorry homie!
you guys suck though
Rude
